entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 31 December 2022
